Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $12,000. Considering its high quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's a perfect match for your needs. To make this opportunity even more appealing, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $11,500. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to respond promptly to secure this exceptional deal. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
